actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to increase civil service retirement annuities of certain employees who retired before July 18, 1966, with reduced annuities.

summary.text: Increases civil service retirement annuities for any former Federal employee who retired prior to July 18, 1966, with a reduced annuity if such employee: (1) would have been eligible to have voluntarily retired on a full annuity under specified provisions of the Civil Service Retirement Act; or (2) would have, if involuntarily separated under such Act, been entitled to an annuity computed under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to increase civil service retirement annuities of certain employees who retired before July 18, 1966, with reduced annuities.
